additional.message_body:
Please fill out the request via our online form and we will review it and assign an address.  We will need a site/building layout showing both units, hand drawn is fine unless you have something more formal.  


[url]



Thank you,
[personal_name]

Hi.  My name is [personal_name].  I am emailing because I am needing to know the proper procedure for getting a separate 911 address for the residence that I am renting.  I unit I am renting shares a wall with another residence but does interconnect.  I am paying rent on it also.   I have been informed that it does not count as a separate residence if it does not have a separate 911 address though my attorney stated otherwise.  The address is [address] and I would be considered apartment B I suppose.  I would like to make this an official request to split my apartment into B.  
Thank you for your help and any information you provide.  
[personal_name]
[phone_number]
